## miette() function

Miette Decorator function to be used on Error

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function miette(code: string, source: string): <T extends new (...args: any[]) => {}>(constructor: T) => {
    new (...args: any[]): {
        stackHolder: void;
        name: string;
        stack: string;
    };
} & T;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  code | string | error code |
|  source | string | raw source that miette needs to annotate |

<b>Returns:</b>

\<T extends new (...args: any\[]) => {}>(constructor: T) => { new (...args: any\[]): { stackHolder: void; name: string; stack: string; }; } & T
